snippet.title: Armello - Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on Steam: http://bit.ly/1wmwFMN

Armello combines the strategic play of card and board games with RPG elements. Wage epic single and multiplayer strategy battles as you adventure across the land of Armello on your quest for the throne!

http://www.armello.com
http://www.facebook.com/armellogame
http://www.twitter.com/armellogame

League of Geeks (http://www.leagueofgeeks.com) collaborated with our incredibly talented friends at 12 Field (http://www.12field.com.au) to bring this ambitious and stunning trailer to life. We love them to bits and you should too!

Music by the extraordinary Michael Allen (http://www.michaelallen.com.au).
